dict.acceptation: 使相信，说服，使承认；使明白；使确信；使悔悟，使认错[罪]；

sent.orig: I suppressed any thoughts of her, trying to convince myself that I was over it.
sent.trans: 我压制她所有的想法，设法让自己相信我已经没事了。

sent.orig: It is difficult to convince him.
He tried to convince me of his innocence.
sent.trans: 他试图使我相信他是清白的。

sent.orig: How can you convince them to accept him?
sent.trans: 你怎么能说服他们接受他吗？

sent.orig: Her parents cannot convince her that she has made a wrong decision.
sent.trans: 她父母亲无法说服她，让她相信她的决定错了。
